story.headline: ROIMax Inc. Ships the ROIMax Connector v2.0, Adding Additional Product Flexibility
story.summary: ROIMax Connector v2.0 features industry's only truly flexible product
story.content:
CAMBRIDGE, Mass., - March 7, 2001 - ROIMax, Inc. (Nasdaq: ROI) today announced the general availability of ROIMax Connector 2, the industry's first shipping, fully certified flexible product. Building on its tradition of innovation, ROIMax brings to market a powerful new way to manage business across the enterprise. ROIMax Connector 2 helps enable businesses to achieve the goal of any strategy: to convert prospects into customers and turn interest into loyalty.
The ROIMax Connector 2 product delivers three key components that are critical to success: flexibility; a deployment-ready and customizable product; and a highly scalable, product critical to evolving businesses.
"ROIMax is committed to providing a fully integrated product for businesses that want to improve their efforts," said Sally Anwarp, ROIMax co-founder and chief officer. "With the delivery of ROIMax Connector 2, not only are we one of the first shipping products to receive brand certification, but we are also bringing a full suite of products that significantly advance the delivery of a complete solution. With ROIMax Connector 2, we're providing full featured products that speed delivery of services with breakthrough technology, while retaining the advantage of being fully customizable and extensible."
"As the first connector provider to be certified, ROIMax is taking a leadership role in the enterprise economy," said Richard Young, Vice President Connector Development at Geomatrix, Inc. "We are pleased to have a powerhouse like ROIMax among the family." With Connector 2, ROIMax is a pioneer in connectors - from acquisition and behavior to retention and loyalty - to increase lifetime value. ROIMax Connector 2 delivers the out-of-box capabilities that accelerate time to delivery as well as the ability to rapidly re-deploy that is critical for effective business.
About ROIMax ROIMax, Inc. is a leading provider of products and services. ROIMax offers an integrated suite of products and services, as well as related integration and support services. The ROIMax Connector product enables Global 1000 enterprises, as well as new businesses.
The ROIMax Connector solution is designed to provide businesses with the core tools required to deploy products. Connector is licensed to over 425 customers. The company is headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts with additional locations throughout North America, Europe, and Asia Pacific.
Connector is a registered trademark of ROIMax.
